description.en: Anime4up - Arabic website to watch and download Arabic subbed anime with multiple servers.
description.ga_IE: Anime4up - Suíomh Gréasáin Araibis chun féachaint ar agus íoslódáil anime subbed Araibis le freastalaithe iolracha.
description.nl: Anime4up - Arabische website om Arabische ondertekende anime met meerdere servers te bekijken en te downloaden.
